Html:
Hi,

Does anyone know how to get the last item of a WPF data grid. Also I want to get the selected row number.

Thanks,

+Dushantha

Hi,

To get the index of the last item in the grid:  int lastIdx = myDataGrid.Items.Count - 1;

To get the last item, depending on how the datagrid is bound, (mine is to a list of business objects)

myObject gridItem = myDataGrid.Items[lastIdx] as myObject;

That should do it

Ron
